price: Allah dirá: "Não disputeis junto de Mim. E, com efeito, antecipei-vos a cominação."
arabic: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُواْ لَدَيَّ وَقَدۡ قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡكُم بِٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla lā takhtaṣimū ladayya waqad qaddamtu ilaykum bil-waʿīdi
